name: Road Rash: Jailbreak
summary: Road Rash: Jailbreak is a racing video game developed by EA Redwood Shores for the PlayStation version and Magic Pockets for the Game Boy Advance version and published by Electronic Arts for PlayStation in 2000 and Game Boy Advance and in 2003. It is the sixth and final game in the Road Rash series.
info:
• 中文名: 暴力摩托：越狱
  • 开发: Visceral Games
  • 发行: Electronic Arts

  • 平台: GBA
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2000年2月1日
